entry.title: Hoya Archboldiana
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 28.99

There are hundreds of species of Hoya that are mainly known for their waxy leaves and their beautiful, porcelain-like flowers.  

Most Hoya are epiphytic plants, growing in tree tops. This means that they prefer to be kept in a small pot with course, well-draining soil. Avoid cutting off any long tendrils as they will eventually grow leaves and flowers!

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Medium to bright indirect light
 Water moderately when soil is almost dry
 White and burgundy porcelaine flowers
 Non-toxic to animals
 Growth : Trailing or climbing, up to 2 ft
 Origin : Papua New Guinea
 Grown in Canada
